00031 // Error support
00032 
00033 extern void
00034 SyncSetErrInner(struct SyncBaseStruct *base,
00035                 enum SyncErrCode code,
00036                 char * file, int line) {
00037     struct SyncErrStruct *err = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncErrStruct);
00038     err->code = code;
00039     err->file = file;
00040     err->line = line;
00041     struct SyncErrStruct *lag = base->errList;
00042     while (lag != NULL) {
00043         struct SyncErrStruct *next = lag->next;
00044         if (next == NULL) break;
00045         lag = next;
00046     }
00047     if (lag != NULL) lag->next = err;
00048     else base->errList = err;
00049 }
00050 
00051 extern void
00052 SyncClearErr(struct SyncBaseStruct *base) {
00053     for (;;) {
00054         struct SyncErrStruct *err = base->errList;
00055         if (err == NULL) break;
00056         base->errList = err->next;
00057         free(err);
00058     }
00059 }
00060 
00061 // used to forward debug messages to the client (if present)
00062 extern void
00063 sync_msg(struct SyncBaseStruct *base, const char *fmt, ...) {
00064     if (base != NULL) {
00065         struct sync_plumbing *sd = base->sd;
00066         if (sd != NULL && sd->sync_data == base
00067             && sd->client_methods != NULL && sd->client_methods->r_sync_msg != NULL) {
00068             va_list ap;
00069             char temp[5000];
00070             va_start(ap, fmt);
00071             vsnprintf(temp, sizeof(temp), fmt, ap);
00072             sd->client_methods->r_sync_msg(sd, "%s", temp);
00073             va_end(ap);
00074         }
00075     }
00076 }
00077 
00078 // Basic object support
00079 
00080 static int
00081 getEnvLimited(char *key, int lo, int hi, int def) {
00082     char *s = getenv(key);
00083     if (s != NULL && s[0] != 0) {
00084         int x = strtol(s, NULL, 10);
00085         if (x >= lo && x <= hi) return x;
00086     }
00087     return def;
00088 }
00089 
00090 /**
00091  * the default behavior for sync_start is to read the options, but not start anything
00092  */
00093 static int
00094 sync_start_default(struct sync_plumbing *sd,
00095                    struct ccn_charbuf *state_buf) {
00096     
00097     if (sd == NULL) return -1;
00098     struct SyncBaseStruct *base = (struct SyncBaseStruct *) sd->sync_data;
00099     if (base == NULL || base->sd != sd) return -1;
00100     
00101     char *here = "Sync.sync_start";
00102     
00103     // called when there is a Repo that is ready for Sync activity
00104     struct SyncPrivate *priv = base->priv;
00105     
00106     int enable = getEnvLimited("CCNS_ENABLE", 0, 1, 1);
00107     
00108     if (enable <= 0) return -1;
00109     
00110     char *debugStr = getenv("CCNS_DEBUG");
00111     int debug = 0;
00112     // TBD: use a centralized definition that is NOT in Repo
00113     if (debugStr == NULL)
00114         debug = CCNL_NONE;
00115     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "NONE") == 0)
00116         debug = CCNL_NONE;
00117     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "SEVERE") == 0)
00118         debug = CCNL_SEVERE;
00119     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "ERROR") == 0)
00120         debug = CCNL_ERROR;
00121     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "WARNING") == 0)
00122         debug = CCNL_WARNING;
00123     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "INFO") == 0)
00124         debug = CCNL_INFO;
00125     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "FINE") == 0)
00126         debug = CCNL_FINE;
00127     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "FINER") == 0)
00128         debug = CCNL_FINER;
00129     else if (strcasecmp(debugStr, "FINEST") == 0)
00130         debug = CCNL_FINEST;
00131     base->debug = debug;
00132     
00133     // enable/disable storing of sync tree nodes
00134     // default is to store
00135     priv->useRepoStore = getEnvLimited("CCNS_REPO_STORE", 0, 1, 1);
00136     
00137     // enable/disable stable recovery point
00138     // default is to disable recovery, but to calculate stable points
00139     priv->stableEnabled = getEnvLimited("CCNS_STABLE_ENABLED", 0, 1, 1);
00140     
00141     // get faux error percent
00142     priv->fauxErrorTrigger = getEnvLimited("CCNS_FAUX_ERROR",
00143                                            0, 99, 0);
00144     
00145     // get private flags for SyncActions
00146     priv->syncActionsPrivate = getEnvLimited("CCNS_ACTIONS_PRIVATE",
00147                                              0, 255, 3);
00148     
00149     // heartbeat rate
00150     priv->heartbeatMicros = getEnvLimited("CCNS_HEARTBEAT_MICROS",
00151                                           10000, 10*1000000, 200000);
00152     
00153     // root advise lifetime
00154     priv->rootAdviseFresh = getEnvLimited("CCNS_ROOT_ADVISE_FRESH",
00155                                           1, 30, 4);
00156     
00157     // root advise lifetime
00158     priv->rootAdviseLifetime = getEnvLimited("CCNS_ROOT_ADVISE_LIFETIME",
00159                                              1, 30, 20);
00160     
00161     // root advise lifetime
00162     priv->fetchLifetime = getEnvLimited("CCNS_NODE_FETCH_LIFETIME",
00163                                         1, 30, 4);
00164     
00165     // max node or content fetches busy per root
00166     priv->maxFetchBusy = getEnvLimited("CCNS_MAX_FETCH_BUSY",
00167                                        1, 100, 6);
00168     
00169     // max number of compares busy
00170     priv->maxComparesBusy = getEnvLimited("CCNS_MAX_COMPARES_BUSY",
00171                                           1, 100, 4);
00172     
00173     // # of bytes permitted for RootAdvise delta mode
00174     priv->deltasLimit = getEnvLimited("CCNS_DELTAS_LIMIT",
00175                                       0, 8000, 0);
00176     
00177     // scope for generated interests
00178     priv->syncScope = getEnvLimited("CCNS_SYNC_SCOPE",
00179                                     0, 2, 2);
00180     
00181     
00182     if (base->debug >= CCNL_INFO) {
00183         char temp[1024];
00184         int pos = 0;
00185         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00186                         "CCNS_ENABLE=%d",
00187                         enable);
00188         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00189                         ",CCNS_DEBUG=%s",
00190                         debugStr);
00191         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00192                         ",CCNS_REPO_STORE=%d",
00193                         priv->useRepoStore);
00194         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00195                         ",CCNS_STABLE_ENABLED=%d",
00196                         priv->stableEnabled);
00197         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00198                         ",CCNS_FAUX_ERROR=%d",
00199                         priv->fauxErrorTrigger);
00200         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00201                         ",CCNS_ACTIONS_PRIVATE=%d",
00202                         priv->syncActionsPrivate);
00203         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00204                         ",CCNS_HEARTBEAT_MICROS=%d",
00205                         priv->heartbeatMicros);
00206         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00207                         ",CCNS_ROOT_ADVISE_FRESH=%d",
00208                         priv->rootAdviseFresh);
00209         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00210                         ",CCNS_ROOT_ADVISE_LIFETIME=%d",
00211                         priv->rootAdviseLifetime);
00212         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00213                         ",CCNS_NODE_FETCH_LIFETIME=%d",
00214                         priv->fetchLifetime);
00215         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00216                         ",CCNS_MAX_FETCH_BUSY=%d",
00217                         priv->maxFetchBusy);
00218         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00219                         ",CCNS_MAX_COMPARES_BUSY=%d",
00220                         priv->maxComparesBusy);
00221         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00222                         ",CCNS_DELTAS_LIMIT=%d",
00223                         priv->deltasLimit);
00224         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00225                         ",CCNS_SYNC_SCOPE=%d",
00226                         priv->syncScope);
00227         pos += snprintf(temp+pos, sizeof(temp)-pos,
00228                         ",defer_verification=%d",
00229                         ccn_defer_verification(sd->ccn, -1));
00230         sync_msg(base, "%s, %s", here, temp);
00231     }
00232     
00233     return 1;
00234 }
00235 
00236 static void
00237 SyncFreeBase(struct SyncBaseStruct **bp) {
00238     if (bp != NULL) {
00239         struct SyncBaseStruct *base = *bp;
00240         *bp = NULL;
00241         if (base != NULL) {
00242             struct SyncPrivate *priv = base->priv;
00243             struct SyncNameAccumList *nal = NULL;
00244             struct SyncNameAccumList *nalNext = NULL;
00245             // free the errList
00246             SyncClearErr(base);
00247             // free the roots
00248             while (priv->rootHead != NULL) {
00249                 if (SyncRemRoot(priv->rootHead) != NULL) break;
00250             }
00251             // free the name accums
00252             if (priv->topoAccum != NULL)
00253                 SyncFreeNameAccumAndNames(priv->topoAccum);
00254             if (priv->prefixAccum != NULL)
00255                 SyncFreeNameAccumAndNames(priv->prefixAccum);
00256             if (priv->comps != NULL)
00257                 ccn_indexbuf_destroy(&priv->comps);
00258             // free the name accums in the filter list
00259             if (priv->filters != NULL) {
00260                 for (nal = priv->filters; nal != NULL; nal = nalNext) {
00261                     nalNext = nal->next;
00262                     SyncFreeNameAccumAndNames(nal->accum);
00263                     free(nal);
00264                 }
00265             }
00266             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&priv->sliceCmdPrefix);
00267             ccn_charbuf_destroy(&priv->localHostPrefix);
00268             free(priv);
00269             free(base);
00270         }
00271     }
00272 }
00273 
00274 static int
00275 sync_notify_default(struct sync_plumbing *sd,
00276                     struct ccn_charbuf *name,
00277                     int enum_index,
00278                     uint64_t seq_num) {
00279     struct SyncBaseStruct *base = (struct SyncBaseStruct *) sd->sync_data;
00280     if (base == NULL || base->sd != sd) return -1;
00281     // the default is to append the name to the namesToFetch for each root
00282     SyncAddName(base, name, seq_num);
00283     return 0;
00284 }
00285 
00286 extern void
00287 sync_stop_default(struct sync_plumbing *sd,
00288                   struct ccn_charbuf *state_buf) {
00289     char *here = "Sync.sync_stop";
00290     if (sd == NULL) return;
00291     struct SyncBaseStruct *base = (struct SyncBaseStruct *) sd->sync_data;
00292     if (base == NULL || base->sd != sd) return;
00293     int debug = base->debug;
00294     if (debug >= CCNL_INFO)
00295         sync_msg(base, "%s", here);
00296     sd->sync_data = NULL;
00297     base->sd = NULL;
00298     SyncFreeBase(&base);
00299 }
00300 
00301 struct sync_plumbing_sync_methods defaultMethods = {
00302     &sync_start_default,
00303     &sync_notify_default,
00304     &sync_stop_default
00305 };
00306 
00307 extern struct SyncBaseStruct *
00308 SyncNewBase(struct sync_plumbing *sd) {
00309     int64_t now = SyncCurrentTime();
00310     struct SyncBaseStruct *base = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncBaseStruct);
00311     base->sd = sd;
00312     sd->sync_data = base;
00313     sd->sync_methods = &defaultMethods;
00314     struct SyncPrivate *priv = NEW_STRUCT(1, SyncPrivate);
00315     base->priv = priv;
00316     priv->topoAccum = SyncAllocNameAccum(4);
00317     priv->prefixAccum = SyncAllocNameAccum(4);
00318     priv->sliceCmdPrefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
00319     priv->localHostPrefix = ccn_charbuf_create();
00320     priv->comps = ccn_indexbuf_create();
00321     priv->lastCacheClean = now;
00322     ccn_name_from_uri(priv->localHostPrefix, "/%C1.M.S.localhost");
00323     ccn_name_from_uri(priv->sliceCmdPrefix, "/%C1.M.S.localhost/%C1.S.cs");
00324     return base;
00325 }
